ygData.subject: Re: On alliance again
ygData.msgSnippet: um whatever, be sad about enchanters and know that Verrant seems to not care about enchanters but is instead improving other classes.  You will see no
ygData.messageBody:
um whatever, be sad about enchanters and know that Verrant seems to not
care about enchanters but is instead improving other classes. You will
see no improvement to the enchanter class and the problems you've
mentioned with spells probably won't ever be fixed...

Now, to help you understand what I meant in my previous post, take the
above statement and make all the negative things positive. I take all
the complaining about enchanters to be the top statement and my previous
post to be the opposite, which is characterized by the statement
below...

be HAPPY about enchanters and know that Verrant seems to CARE about
enchanters but is instead improving other classes FIRST. You will see
improvementS to the enchanter class and the problems you've mentioned
with spells probably WILL be fixed.

Now, be positive and let Verrant know how you feel. Give them
constructive feedback and let them know you are unhappy.

-----Original Message-----
From: WeinisFROG@... [mailto:WeinisFROG@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 1:01 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On alliance again


From: WeinisFROG@...

is that supposed to make sus feel better?? that fact that they are
making us
stinkier and making other classes better?
